DOC.brief_title: Effects Aerobic Exercise Treating Alzheimer 's Disease
DOC.detailed_description: Aerobic exercise hold great promise treat cognitive impairment , hallmark symptom Alzheimer 's disease ( AD ) , may attenuate brain atrophy . AD currently affect 5 million Americans , cost $ 203 billion 2013 cause poor outcome loss independence , low quality life , nurse home placement . Available drug modest short-term effect reduce slow cognitive impairment AD . Hence , press need develop test aerobic exercise intervention AD . This randomize control trial ( RCT ) investigate effect 6-month , individualized , moderate-intensity cycling intervention cognition hippocampal volume AD three aim : - Determine immediate effect cycle intervention cognition AD . - Examine cycling intervention slow cognitive decline AD baseline 12 month . - Assess effect aerobic exercise hippocampal volume AD 12 month use MRI . The investigator randomize 90 participant 6-month cycling stretching/range motion exercise ( 20-50-minute , 3 time week ) . Participants follow another 6 month . Cognition assess baseline , 3 , 6 , 9 , 12 month hippocampal volume measure use magnetic resonance imaging ( MRI ) baseline , 6 , 12 month . Transportation provide participant study-related activity include exercise . Participants could undergo MRI still participate .
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis probable possible Alzheimer 's disease ( AD ) ; 15≤ MiniMental State Examination ( MMSE ) score ≤26 ; Clinical Dementia Rating score 0.52 ; Communitydwelling , e.g. , home assist living ; Age 66 year old ; Englishspeaking ; Verified exercise safety primary care provider cardiologists subject significant cardiac history ; Stable AD drug > 1 month AD drug prescribe . Resting heart rate ( HR ) ≤50 ≥100 beats/min ; Neurological disorder past 5 year ; Psychiatric disorder past 5 year ; Alcohol chemical dependency past 5 year ; Contraindications exercise ; New symptom diseases evaluated health care provider , e.g. , hip fracture , ongoing unplanned weight loss , severe shortness breath , deep vein thrombosis , hernia , unhealed sore , joint swelling , pain trouble walking ; Cardiac ischemia serious arrhythmia electrocardiograph screen exercise test .
